Subject: Contact with Hell Beast
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave:




Shockwave had set his engine settings to resist the intense cold of the 
antarctic, and finished his scans.  He opened up a tight laser beam message 
heavily encrypted in an old type of comm. codes that Hell Beast had used when 
he first landed on Past Earth.  Shockwave had gotten that information from an 
old member of Hell Beast's gang long ago.

He opened up a comm. transmission.  "Unit Hell Beast, I wish to discuss terms 
of a union between you and my comrades.  I wish to speak in person, not from 
the freezing cold to you in your base."
